item.title: Sources: Kraft not selected for HOF Class of 2026
item.description: Patriots owner Robert Kraft, like his former head coach Bill Belichick, was not selected for entry into this year's Pro Football Hall of Fame class, s...

item.title: Sources: Giants to hire Nagy as Harbaugh's OC
item.description: The Giants will hire Matt Nagy as their offensive coordinator, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

item.title: Vonn (ACL) 'confident' she'll compete at Olympics
item.description: American skier Lindsey Vonn is "confident" she'll race at the Milan Cortina Winter Olympics despite suffering ACL and meniscus injuries to her left kn...

item.title: Clippers, Harden exploring trade, sources say
item.description: The LA Clippers and James Harden are exploring trades ahead of Thursday's deadline, with the Cavaliers one of the teams expressing interest.

item.title: Sources: Bucks countering trade offers for Giannis
item.description: The Bucks have submitted counteroffers to teams aggressively seeking a trade for two-time MVP Giannis Antetokounmpo, sources told ESPN.
